ARABIC: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Does each one of them aspire to be admitted into a Garden of Delight?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Does every one of them wish to enter the garden of tranquility?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Does everyone of them wish to enter the Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Does every one of them desire to enter the bountiful Paradise?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Does every man among them aspire to be admitted into the Garden of serenity?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Does every man of them hope to enter the Paradise of Delight
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Does every man of them desire that he should be made to enter the garden of bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, is every man of them eager to be admitted to a Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Doth every man among them hope to enter the Garden of Delight?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Does every one of them aspire to be admitted into a Garden of Delight?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Coveteth every man of them, that he shall enter the Garden of Delight?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Does each man among them hope to enter the garden of bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Does every man of them hope to enter the Paradise of delight?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, is every one of them eager to be admitted to the Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is every one of them aspiring to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:38]   Does each one of them hope to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Doth every man among them hope to enter the Garden of Delight?) This is an answer from Allah to the disbelievers that He will not let them enter the Garden.
